markdownRemark.html: Just 15 minutes from the center of Seville, by the A-66 Sevilla-Mérida highway, lies this golf course. This is a 18-hole course, par 71, designed by Manuel Piñero. Players will find this a very technical course due to its narrow fairways and assorted hazards. The landscape features around the course include gentle slopes, avenues and lakes.

frontmatter.title: Club de Golf Hato Verde
frontmatter.description: Club de Golf Hato Verde - Just 15 minutes from the center of Seville, by the A-66 Sevilla-Mérida highway, lies this golf course. This is a 18-hole course, par 71, designed by Manuel Piñero. Players will find this a very technical course due to its narrow fairways and assorted hazards. The landscape features around the course include gentle slopes, avenues and lakes.
frontmatter.address: C/ Manuel Piñero, 81 41219 Las Pajanosas, Sevilla, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 36.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 52.00 euros
